Params: {3: 'Ruins stand jagged and tangled, as birds carry off bleached bones and mournful songs.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Her coating peels away bit by bit under the relentless wind and sand. With a heavy tombstone strapped to her back, she stares vacantly at the endless road stretching before her.'}
{3: 'Her wandering gaze drifts to the crumbling walls beside her, a blurred visage flickering in the shattered glass, as a lone snowflake slowly settles on her eyelash.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I heard she killed the priest who raised her since childhood with her own hands, right there in the Snowfields.', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: "It's as they say, people who come in contact with the witch will...", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "Get outta here! Outta our city! Demons like you aren't welcomed here!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The stains of grime cling to her garments...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "How useless. You couldn't even finish off a Corrupted. What a coward.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: 'When I learned they called you "witch," I was hoping you could be a merciless leader who never hesitates... How laughable!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Who is talking, and who... is watching me?'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Who is talking, and who... is watching me?'}
{1: "What I've believed in... is it truly right?"}
{3: "What I've believed in... is it truly right?"}
{1: 'What "role" am I meant to take... in this world?'}
{3: 'What "role" am I meant to take... in this world?'}
{3: "The gravel beneath her feet turns to mud, sucking her down into the swamp's hungry whirlpool."}
{3: 'And there she sees itâ€”herself adrift in the Red Tide.'}
{3: "Her voice catches in her parched throat, her hand stretching out in vain as the Red Tide's corruption seeps deeper, pulling her consciousness away from her body."}
{3: "She can't fall like this. She knows she can't..."}
{3: 'Without warning, her visual module shuts down, plunging her into absolute blackness.'}
{3: '<color=#ffffffff>The witch plunges into the deep sea.</color>'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Mister... This is not the "awakening" time we agreed on.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I'm aware. I decided to wake you earlier than planned.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'We need to begin breeding the Red Tide ahead of schedule.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'There have been some unexpected complications. The facility beneath the Copperfield Aquarium... it can no longer wait.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man flips through his notebook and speaks calmly.'}
{3: "The purple-haired ascendant who was just awakened is clearly still in a drowsy state, unable to immediately grasp Vonnegut's meaning."}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Do you mean that Tower you mentioned before, Mister?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "I haven't heard anything from <phonetic=me in that tower>that place</phonetic> in quite some time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "We need to start the Copperfield Aquarium's plans ahead of time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "Then... what about the aquarium's lower third level...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With his expression hidden behind his mask, the man quickly flips two pages, snaps his notebook shut, and fixes his gaze once more on the purple-haired ascendant.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Be quick. We don't have much time left.", 4: '2'}
